channel.title: How do i make a re-directing page?
channel.description:
How do you make a page so it re-directs to a different website. but keeps the domain.
for example:
www.lagex.net/download/toolbar
would take me to the site were down load it from but keep that url?
if not possible how do i just redirect?

item.title: How do i make a re-directing page?
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:4, topic:50470”][quote author=wonderguy6 link=topic=70868.msg805781#msg805781 date=1169464521]

CONTENT="5

Change the 5 to how many seconds to wait before redirecting.[/quote]
Ya I Know

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a re-directing page?

item.title: How do i make a re-directing page?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“wonderguy6, post:3, topic:50470”][quote author=usernamelol link=topic=70868.msg805775#msg805775 date=1169464321]

<META HTTP-EQUIV="Refresh" CONTENT="5; URL=lalalala.com> [/quote] THX![/quote] [code] CONTENT="5 [/code] Change the 5 to how many seconds to wait before redirecting.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a re-directing page?

item.title: How do i make a re-directing page?
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

[quote=“usernamelol, post:2, topic:50470”]<META HTTP-EQUIV=“Refresh”
CONTENT="5; URL=lalalala.com>[/quote]
THX!
